title: Rongzadwng  . . . . Halleluiya
lyrics:
Rongzadwng  . . . . . . . .  “Halleluiya”- 3
Gabjridwng  . . . . . . . .  “Hossanna”- 3
“Jerusalemni mwndirao” -2, “2”
(A)
Joitun hadorni ser  ser
Pwrbu Jisua honwi gada bisayao -2
Bese rongzadwng honwi, papi subung hari-a
Halleluiya . . . Hossanna . . . hwnnanwi
(B)
Undunai subung harikhou fwjanw
Fwidwng phorbu nwng papi buhumao -2
Hambai hwnw jwng phorbu
Gwjou okhwrangni gwjwn
Be hayao, jafungthwng, oraibw
